casebody.data:
Martin E. ROCK
v.
EXECUTIVE OFFICE PARK OF DURHAM ASSOCIATION, INC., Claimant No. 428P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 1, 2018 Mr. Martin E. Rock, For Rock, Martin E. Mr. J. Matthew Waters, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, For Executive Office Park of Durham Association, Inc. Ms. Hope Derby Carmichael, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, For Executive Office Park of Durham Association, Inc.

ORDER

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 15th of December 2017 by Respondent for Leave to File Reply:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of March 2018."

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Respondent on the 22nd of December 2017 for Writ of Supersedeas of the judgment of the Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of March 2018."

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd of December 2017 by Respondent to Amend Supplemental Reply and Response and Motions:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of March 2018."
